lore.oculos_1: A curse bestowed upon a broken soul.
lore.oculos_2: Gain power through the death of others.
lore.oculos_unlocked.2: reducing how resistant their armor is.
lore.oculos_unlocked.2_2: and you are able to photosynthesize, however
lore.oculos_unlocked.2_3: you take more damage than normal.
